short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help learn about Pins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to get information from Pinterest Pins that is typically otherwise not displayed. This is helpful for getting key information like the date the Pin was created on or the number of times the Pin has been re-pinned.

To use this extension, navigate to a Pin close-up view (such as https://www.pinterest.com/pin/673851163010879386/) then click this extension's bookmarklet and the 'Get Pin Info' button. The page will refresh and after a few seconds you will see a page that highlights important information about the pin that you were viewing.
